E wuru Oshodi-Apapa Expressway n'etiti afọ 1975 na 1978 dị ka ụzọ isi gaa Tincan na Apapa Port nakwa ụzọ isi banye na mba ahụ site na Murtala Mohammed International Airport. N'ihi ileghara anya na ọtụtụ afọ nke okporo ụzọ awara awara, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ daa, na-eme ka usoro mmiri ahụ daa kpamkpam.
Goodluck Jonathan duziri gọọmentị kwadoro nkwekọrịta maka iwughachi OshodişApapa Expressway n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013
E nyere Julius Berger Nigeria PLC nkwekọrịta maka Oshodi Apapa Expressway maka Nde Naira iri na ise n'ọnwa iri na ise
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 2015 gasịrị, ọrụ n'okporo ụzọ kwụsịrị
Òtù Dangote kwadoro Gọọmentị nke Buhari na-eduzi n'afọ 2017 ka a rụzie okporo ụzọ OshodişApapa Expressway
Atụmatụ Dangote Group gụnyere ebe dị iche iche dị ka imezigharị okporo ụzọ na-amalite na Creek Road, Liverpool, Tin Can, ma na-aga n'ihu ruo Marine Beach, Mile 2 ruo Oshodi, Oworonshoki, na Toll Gate

Nkwekọrịta maka imezigharị okporo ụzọ si Apapa gaa n'ọnụ ụzọ mbata na okporo ụzọ Lagos-Ibadan na steeti Lagos kwadoro ya na Julai 2018.. Otú ọ dị, e nyere Dangote Group ọrụ nrụzigharị ahụ, na mgbakwunye, gọọmentị ga-enye ndị otu Dangote ụtụ isi afọ atọ. N'afọ 2018, kansụl gọọmentị etiti kwadoro N72.9bn maka iwughachi okporo ụzọ Oshodi Apapa na Lagos.
E nyere ọrụ ahụ na Hitech Construction Company Ltd, ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ, nke malitere ịrụ ọrụ na mmezigharị OshodiʹApapa Expressway n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2019.
A na-atụ anya na a ga-arụcha ọrụ ahụ n'ime afọ abụọ site na ụbọchị mmalite, mana Gọọmentị etiti kwuru na Eprel n'afọ 2021 na Oshodiz Apapa Expressway fọrọ nke nta ka ọ dị njikere maka iji ya.
